question_short_es: Percepción de inseguridad en el vecindario

question_en: Speaking of the neighborhood where you live and thinking of the possibility of being assaulted or robbed, do you feel very safe, somewhat safe, somewhat unsafe or very unsafe?
responses_en: (1) Very safe (2) Somewhat safe (3) Somewhat unsafe (4) Very unsafe
responses_en_rec: (1) Very unsafe (2) Somewhat unsafe (3) Somewhat safe (4) Very safe
question_en_comp: Speaking of the neighborhood where you live and thinking of the possibility of being assaulted or robbed, do you feel very safe, somewhat safe, somewhat unsafe or very unsafe? (1) Very unsafe (2) Somewhat unsafe (3) Somewhat safe (4) Very safe

question_short_es: Golpe de Estado justificado frente a mucha delincuencia
question_short_en: Coup is Justified when Crime is High
question_es: Alguna gente dice que en ciertas circunstancias se justificaría que los militares de este país tomen el poder por un golpe de Estado. En su opinión se justificaría que hubiera un golpe de estado por los militares frente a las siguientes circunstancias... ? Frente a mucha delincuencia.
question_en: Some people say that under some circumstances it would be justified for the military of this country to take power by a coup d'état (military coup). In your opinion would a military coup be justified under the following circumstances? When there is a lot of crime
responses_en: (1) A military take-over of the state would be justified (2) A military take-over of the state would not be justified
responses_en_rec: (1)  A military take-over of the state would not be justified (2) A military take-over of the state would be justified
question_en_comp: Some people say that under some circumstances it would be justified for the military of this country to take power by a coup d'état (military coup). In your opinion would a military coup be justified under the following circumstances? When there is a lot of crime (1)  A military take-over of the state would not be justified (2) A military take-over of the state would be justified

question_short_es: Justifica que ejecutivo gobierne sin legislatura
question_short_en: Executive Justified in Governing without Legislature
question_es: ¿Cree usted que cuando el país enfrenta momentos muy difíciles, se justifica que el [ejecutivo] del país cierre [la legislatura] y gobierne sin [la legislatura]?
question_en: Do you believe that when the country is facing very difficult times it is justifiable for [the executive] of the country to close the [legislature] and govern without [the legislature]?
responses_en: (1) Yes, it is justified (2) No, it is not justified
responses_en_rec: (1) No, it is not justified  (2) Yes, it is justified
question_en_comp: Do you believe that when the country is facing very difficult times it is justifiable for [the executive] of the country to close the [legislature] and govern without [the legislature]? (1) No, it is not justified  (2) Yes, it is justified

question_short_es: Justifica que el ejecutivo disuelva la corte suprema
question_short_en: Justified for the Executive to Dissolve the Supreme Court
question_es: ¿Cree usted que cuando el país enfrenta momentos muy difíciles se justifica que el presidente/primer ministro del país disuelva la Corte Suprema de Justicia y gobierne sin la Corte Suprema de Justicia?
question_en: Do you believe that when the country is facing very difficult times it is justifiable for the president/prime minister of the country to dissolve the Supreme Court of Justice and govern without the Supreme Court of Justice?
responses_en: (1) Yes, it is justified (2) No, it is not justified
responses_en_rec: (1) No, it is not justified  (2) Yes, it is justified

question_es: Cambiando de tema, en esta tarjeta tenemos una escala del 1 a 10 que va de izquierda a derecha, en la que el 1 significa izquierda y el 10 significa derecha. Hoy en día cuando se habla de tendencias políticas, mucha gente habla de aquellos que simpatizan más con la izquierda o con la derecha. Según el sentido que tengan para usted los términos ""izquierda"" y ""derecha"" cuando piensa sobre su punto de vista político, ¿dónde se encontraría usted en esta escala? Dígame el número.
question_en: Now, to change the subject... On this card there is a 1-10 scale that goes from left to right [liberal to conservative]. The number one means left [liberal] and 10 means right [conservative]. Nowadays, when we speak of political leanings, we talk of those on the left and those on the right [of liberals and conservatives]. In other words, some people sympathize more with the left [liberals] and others with the right [conservatives]. According to the meaning that the terms "left" and "right" ["liberals" and "conservatives"] have for you, and thinking of your own political leanings, where would you place yourself on this scale? Tell me the number.
question_en_comp: Now, to change the subject... On this card there is a 1-10 scale that goes from left to right [liberal to conservative]. The number one means left [liberal] and 10 means right [conservative]. Nowadays, when we speak of political leanings, we talk of those on the left and those on the right [of liberals and conservatives]. In other words, some people sympathize more with the left [liberals] and others with the right [conservatives]. According to the meaning that the terms "left" and "right" ["liberals" and "conservatives"] have for you, and thinking of your own political leanings, where would you place yourself on this scale? Tell me the number. (1) Left/liberal (2) (3) (4) (5) (6) (7) (8) (9) (10) Right/conservative
